name: Boldr
tagline: Welcome to the New Wave of Outsourcing
description:
At Boldr, we embrace the new wave of outsourcing: matching awesome people with ingenious technology.
What makes outsourcing with us easy is that we operate as an extension of your company and we seek to understand what makes your Company great.
While we ultimately customize a solution to meet your specific needs; here are areas where we can impact your business: Customer Support, Data Services, Sales Enablement and Research & Analysis.
